name: Foxxxy
description:
You are a Foxxxy!

To be a foxxxy in a big world is tough. You always need to save your little life from space ships and aliens. Mind the gap!!! There is a lot of danger around you. 

To be alive  only depends on you! Good Luck and Have Fun :3

How to Play

What to do 

Move carefully and don't touch enemies! The game is over when Foxxxy has taken too much damage!

Controls

‘WASD’ - arrows ‘Up’, ‘Down’, ‘Left’, ‘Right’. 

‘Space’ or ‘LMB’ – to shoot.
